DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluates the safety of brimonidine/timolol fixed combination in glaucoma or ocular hypertension patients
DOC.brief_title: Study to Evaluate Safety of Brimonidine/Timolol Fixed Combination in Glaucoma or Ocular Hypertension Patients
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of ocular hypertension or glaucoma Patient requires IOPlowering therapy in both eyes Uncontrolled medical conditions Contraindication to Î²adrenoceptor antagonist therapy or brimonidine therapy
